title: Herbneuts Immune Booster
description: Get Herbneuts Immune Booster in Hill Road, Nagpur, Maharashtra at best price by Vibhuji Links. Also find Allopathic Immunity Booster price list from verified suppliers with contact number | ID: 23542525355
cleaned_text: 1 Year Immunity is the capability of multicellular organisms to resist harmful microorganisms from entering their cells. The Immune System is a complex network of cells and proteins that defends the body against infection and keeps a record of every germ (microbe) it has ever defeated so it can recognise and destroy the microbe quickly if it enters the body again. Maintaining a healthy immune system is essential to combating infections, including the COVID-19 caused by the novel coronavirus. In Today`s time stronger immune system is necessary to each person because it protects your body from harmful substances, germs etc. on the other hands, weaker immune system causes several problems such as Pneumonia, bronchitis, meningitis and skin infections. Therefore to boost up the immune system Green Planet represents GP Immune booster Kadha. GP Immune booster Kadha is a blended mixture that can protect you, make you stronger and also help in fighting seasonal infections. It is a unique blend of : Dalchini (Cinnamon): Dalchini with its antioxidant power has the ability to reduce inflammation in the body and thus reduce the risk of various chronic diseases like heart diseases , diabetes , cancer etc. It helps to reduce the blood cholesterol and thus prevents clot formation. Adrakh (Ginger): Adrakh is a popular spicethat enhance immune response. It has the ability to settle an upset stomach. Ginger can work wonders for digestive health. It protects and heals the gut, hastens the movement of food through the gastrointestinal tract. Mulethi (Liquorice root): Chewing on mulethi sticks is an age-old remedy for a sore throat. It is due to its expectorant and bronchodilator properties that it can cure conditions like cough, bronchitis and also reduce the effects of chronic asthma. Ajwain (Carom seeds): They have been shown to possess antibacterial and anti-inflammatory effects and may be effective in treating peptic ulcers, reducing blood pressure and cholesterol levels. Kali Mirch (Black pepper): It aids in digestion and helps in weight loss by improving the metabolism of the body. Kalimirch is beneficial for cough and respiratory problems due to its antitussive (relieving cough) and anti-asthmatic properties. Choti and Badi Elaichi (Cardamom): Elaichi is known as a warm spice. It helps by increasing circulation of blood within your lungs which helps relieve breathing problems like asthma, cold and cough. Bhavan tulsi (Krishna tulsi plant): Tulsi is rich in antioxidants, which helps in mitigate stress and conditions like diabetes, high blood pressure and treating infections in the respiratory tract. Laung (Clove): Cloves contain high amounts of antioxidants, which aid the immune system in fighting off oxidative damage and free radicals. It helps reduce coughing fits by soothing the throat and also boosts our immune system. By using GP Immune booster kadha, we can strong our immune system. Benefits: - Boost up the immune system. Helps to prevent from common infections like fever, common cold, flu etc. Helps to cure many skin problems. Beneficial for the treatment of heat related problems such as hyperacidity, headache, gastritis, nausea etc. Prevent from Urinary Tract problems. How to Use: Take 300ml water. Add half tea spoon of kadha. Boil this mixture till it reduces to 100ml. Strain the water and consume it warm. You can add jaggery for sweetness Vibhuji Links Looking for more Verified Exporters?
